title: Malignant metastatising solitary fibrous tumor of the ovary with additional dedifferentiation and osteoid deposition: an unusual presentation, with a brief description of a diagnostic alghoritm.
abstract: Solitary fibrous tumor (SFT) is a rare spindle cell neoplasm showing fibroblastic differentiation, initially observed in the pleura, but now currently recognized to develop in any extrapleuric location
